title: Davey's butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, diced', '2 teaspoons grated fresh ginger', '1 jalapeno or green chilli, seeded and diced', '1kg butternut squash, cubed', '400ml chicken stock', '350ml evaporated milk', '125ml coconut milk', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '250ml soured cream', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme, or to taste']
